document.docAuthor: Cock, Matthew J. W. & Robbins, Robert K.
document.masterDocTitle: Annotated checklist and biogeographic composition of the Lycaenidae (Lepidoptera) of Trinidad, West Indies

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Annotated checklist and biogeographic composition of the Lycaenidae (Lepidoptera) of Trinidad, West Indies

subSubSection.paragraph:
Siderus bitias (Cramer)
: Kaye (1921 , no. 238), Barcant (1970 , no. 339)

Panthiades bitias (Cramer)
: Beccaloni et al. (2008) , Sookdeo (2013) , Geerah and Rutherford (2015)

Panthiades pelion (Cramer)
: Kaye (1904 , no. 164), Kaye (1921 , no. 253), Barcant (1970 , no. 356), Nicolay (1976) , Lewis (1974 , plate 67.22) [synonym]

paragraph.taxonomicName: Panthiades bathildis (C. Felder and R. Felder, 1865)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Panthiades bathildis (C. Felder and R. Felder)
: Nicolay (1976) , Sookdeo (2013)

Cycnus phaleros (Linnaeus)
: Kaye (1904 , no. 162), Kaye (1921 , no. 244), Barcant (1970 , no. 352), Nicolay (1976)

Robbins (2005) gave the evidence for transferring this species from
Cycnus
to
Panthiades
.

Oenamaus ortygnus (Cramer)
: Kaye (1904 , no. 160), Kaye (1921 , no. 243), Barcant (1970 , no. 350), Lewis (1974 , plate 67.20), Beccaloni et al. (2008) , Faynel et al. (2012)

Bithys phoenissa (Hewitson)
: Kaye (1914) , Kaye (1921 , no. 241), Barcant (1970 , no. 348)

Chalybs jebus (Godart)
: Kaye (1921 , no. 259), Barcant (1970 , no. 333)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Michaelus jebus (Godart)
: Nicolay (1979) ,
D’Abrera (1995 , p. 1159
, 1162), Faynel and Bálint (2004)

subSubSection.paragraph:
A new island record collected by S. Alston-Smith ( ♀ , Hololo Mountain Road, May 1981 , ♂ May 1982 ). Kaye (1921) incorrectly listed
M. thordesa
as a synonym of
M. jebus
. They are distinct species ( Nicolay 1979 ) that are both recorded from Trinidad .
Robbins (2010a) clarifies the treatment in Robbins (2004) .

New island record collected by M.J.W. Cock ( ♂ ,
Arima Valley, Simla, Jan 1981
) and S. Alston-Smith ( ♂ , Brasso,
Oct 2001
; ♀ , Rio Claro-Guayaguayare Road ,
Oct 1993
)
.
